remarks: The property of being a linearly dependent subset.  (Contributed by AV, 26-Apr-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 30-Jul-2019.)
statement:
islindeps.b $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
islindeps.z $e |- Z = ( 0g ` M ) $.
islindeps.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` M ) $.
islindeps.e $e |- E = ( Base ` R ) $.
islindeps.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
islindeps $p |- ( ( M e. W /\ S e. ~P B ) -> ( S linDepS M <-> E. f e. ( E ^m S ) ( f finSupp .0. /\ ( f ( linC ` M ) S ) = Z /\ E. x e. S ( f ` x ) =/= .0. ) ) ) $.
$d E f $.
$d M f x $.
$d S f x $.
